string-array.name: organization_descriptions
string-array.item: Organization Management is led by Eastyanda Putra Kesuma as the Chairman, with Muhammad Kevin Assydiqi as the Vice Chairman. Secretarial duties are handled by Santa Aprilia Simanungkalit (Secretary 1), Jihan Rahman (Secretary 2), and Hana Silvanov Rhamadani (Secretary 3). Morenita Aritonang and Jessyca Sandra Yulina S manage finances as Treasurer 1 and Treasurer 2, respectively. This structure aims to optimize each member\'s contribution towards achieving the organization\'s goals.

The DANUS Division, under HIMASI\'s Treasurer, focuses on entrepreneurship within the association. It innovates by marketing products specifically to Information System students to bolster HIMASI\'s finances. DANUS collaborates with the Mediation Division to design and market creative products through the IG SIStore (@sistore.unja).
The Interest and Talent Division identifies and nurtures the interests and talents of Information System students, providing a platform for their expression.

The Mediation Division disseminates information using creative designs, covering internal campus events and collaborations with other campuses. It collaborates with the DANUS Division to create and market innovative products.
The PSDA Division develops the talents of Information System students and enhances the Information System\'s ecosystem.
The Public Relations Division (HUMAS) builds external relationships for HIMASI and supports other divisions in executing their programs.
The Research and Technology Division fosters the skills of Information System students and promotes a scientific culture.
The Social and Religion Division (SOSGAM) engages in social and religious activities, promoting community involvement and religious adherence.
The Information Systems program at Jambi University prepares skilled professionals in the field.
Jambi University (UNJA) is a public institution in Jambi Province, Indonesia, established on March 23, 1963. Prof. Drs. H. Sutrisno, M.Sc., Ph.D., currently serves as its Rector.
